meaningMnemonic: There was once a <radical>melon</radical> <radical>child</radical>, that is, a child with the body of a melon. When he was born, his parents didn't want him, so he became an <kanji>orphan</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>orphan</kanji> melon boy is but a <reading>子</reading> (こ).
